summary: The Army is working toward rebuilding its current forces and modernizing to meet future threats. We testified on the Army's progress and challenges. For example, the Army has planned to expand its forces—e.g., by creating cyber and electronic warfare units—to prepare for threats from strong adversaries. The Army has also had trouble hiring and retaining critical personnel for its maintenance depots. Continued attention to our...
title: Army Readiness: Progress and Challenges in Rebuilding Personnel, Equipping, and Training
